title: Homemade Presents Biscuits & Jam: Willie Nelson’s Secret to a Good Life
description:
Biscuits & Jam shares food-loving musicians’ stories about home, family tradition and Southern Culture. In this week’s episode, Sid Evans, Editor-in-Chief of Southern Living Magazine, talks to the legendary Willie Nelson about Farm Aid, his love of gospel music and chicken fried steak, and his message of hope for the days ahead.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
